如果對行銷研究的相關工具有興趣絕對要來上這堂課！
老師在顧問業及行銷研究的領域有豐富經驗，上課先教我們怎麼用各種工具：spss, sql, tableau等，作業再以幫企業解決問題的方式進行，有點像在實作個案～ 老師非常歡迎大家提出問題，上課也用輕鬆易懂的方式進行，非常推薦！！！
This professor was always highly motivated and energetic. He also cared a lot about us exchange students. Thank you for your effort with the live stream!
Some program that need for homework or projects can’t use if we don’t have a subscription. So, it is a little bit inconvenient that have to go to computer room to use the program.

Professor gives us a clear picture of the marketing research industry, telling us the real situation and what the companies actually do. We learned a lot of useful tools to deal with the data, which inspire me to develop advanced knowledge.
Really good class. I actually learn a lot.
